key_risk_themes: ["Data Security & Tenant Isolation","Firestore Performance & Cost Management","Third-Party Integration Security (OAuth)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize implementation of a comprehensive test suite for Firestore Security Rules.","Establish and enforce a strict Infrastructure as Code (IaC) policy for Firestore indexes.","Conduct a mandatory security review of the planned Google OAuth 2.0 token handling architecture."]
